name: Space Shooter 2017 (itch)
description:
This is a short experience I made in 2017, in 5/6 hours, for an online class of developing games, it was used Construct 2 to develop.

I was cleaning some old pastes when I saw this project, so I opened up, put some sounds, and here is the result.

Enjoy!! :p

------------How to Play ------------------------------------------------------------------

Arrows - MOVE

Z - SHOOT
developers: Luís Felipe de  Ávila e Silva
